section.title: Security Considerations for PyGlobus
section.para: pyGlobus has a security module which allows for proxy creation, signing, encryption, and the creation and inquiry of security contexts. Care must be taken when developing applications which use GSI to ensure that authentication information will not be compromised. When creating a security context, one must ensure that the context will have the properties that they desire. For example, should the context use confidentiality or integrity? These concerns are not specific to pyGlobus but rather to any application developer who is using low level security APIs.
